summary: Adds new custom perks for damage on all weapons
descriptionHtml:
This mod add 6 new perks for increasing damage for all weapons

The perks are in the 1H perk tree, the perks are as follows; 

Muscle Growth - weapon damage increased by 10%, Requires 25 skill in 1H and 2H

Strength Increased - weapon damage increased by 25%, Requires 30 skill in 1H and 2H

Muscle 2 x- weapon damage increased by 50%, Requires 45 skill in 1H and 2H

Ever Growing - weapon damage increased by 75%, Requires 55 skill in 1H and 2H

Ripped Muscles - weapon damage increased by 125%, Requires 70 skill in 1H and 2H

Max Strength - weapon damage increased by 200%, Requires 100 skill in 1H and 2H

Weapons could get OP if you don\'t want then only use up to Ever Growing or Ripped Muscles.

It also depends on the weapon you are using.

To manual install: download the file then open the .rar and drag and drop the .esp to your data directory in your Skyrim folder, make sure its checked in the data files on your launcher. Enjoy


Change Log
--------------------
-Added more balanced version under optional files




Author Note
This was quickly put to together and this is the first mod i have made
author: Death4653

files.name: Max Strength Perk Balanced
files.changelogHtml: added a more balanced version under optional files
